param.name: submit_dev
param.label: Submit to test ENA server?
param.help: By selecting yes the reads will be submitted

param.name: input_format
param.label: Would you like to submit pregenerated table files or interactively define the input structures?
param.option: Interactive generation of studies structure from dataset

param.name: viral_submission
param.label: Does your submission data belong to a viral sample?
param.help: If you select yes then your data will be submitted using the ENA virus pathogen reporting standard checklist (see: https://ena-browser-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/help_and_guides/sars-cov-2-submissions.html)

param.name: data
param.label: Select all datasets to upload
param.help: Compressed reads files listed in the runs table

param.name: dry_run
param.label: Print the tables but do not submit the datasets
param.help: If yes is selected then NO submission will be performed.

param.name: viral_sample
param.label: Does your submission contains viral samples?

param.name: modify_first
param.label: Mofification of submitted data is not yet possible
